```{r setup}
library(massSight)
library(randomForest)
```

```{r}
hp1_ms <- create_ms_obj(
  hp1,
  name = "hp1"
)
hp2_ms <- create_ms_obj(
  hp2,
  name = "hp2"
)
```

```{r}
matched <- ml_match(hp1_ms, hp2_ms, prob_thresh = 0)
plot_decision_boundary(matched)
```
